ingredients: 2 heads romaine lettuce, chopped into bite-sized pieces
1/2 cup Parmesan cheese, shaved or grated
steps: Make the dressing: In a medium bowl, whisk together garlic, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, and Worcestershire sauce. Add mayonnaise and Parmesan, whisk until smooth. Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking. Season with salt and pepper
Prep the lettuce: Wash and dry romaine thoroughly. Chop into bite-sized pieces
Assemble: In a large bowl, toss romaine with dressing until well coated. Add croutons and Parmesan, toss gently
title: Caesar Salad
